item.title: Inf. HP code
item.dc:creator: @playnskillz playnskillz
item.description:
@playnskillz wrote:

Hey guys…
was Fiddling with my server in redevelopment…
and tried to make an inf hp code…
made one=D

Difficulty- 0.1/10 (sure half of you have already made one)
Purpose - Inf HP I suppose
skills Required - Basic copy/paste
Files Modded - (server)client.java

Disclaimer- not really Inf hp, just constantly resets hp back to x/x- where x is your level.

  1. The INT
    Open up client.java
    CTRL+F & search for “int ancients”
    you should see “int ancients = 0;” (some clients have “public int ancients = 0;”)
    If you cant find that search for “public boolean teleblock”
    if you see “int ancients = 0;”, under that, add int infhp = 0;
    If you see “public int ancients = 0;”, add
public int infhp = 0;
  1. Processing
    ok now go to “public void process()”
    under process add
if (infhp== 1){
        if(IsDead)
        IsDead = false;
        NewHP = playerLevel[3];
        }

so now process looks like this

public void process() { // is being called regularily every 500ms

if (infhp == 1){
        if(IsDead)
        IsDead = false;
        NewHP = playerLevel[3];
        }

Ok so far so good
3. The Command
Find your normal commands
Add this under one of your commands

if (command.equals("infhp") && playerRights >= 1) {
            if (infhp == 0){
				infhp = 1;
				sendMessage("HP Power on");
			}else {
			infhp = 0;
			sendMessage("HP Power off");
			}
		}
  1. Now compile and play.
    type ::infhp and see if it works. to turn it off type it again.
    DONE!

Explanation.
(public) int infhp = 0;
^ this is the int that process reads to see if you have enabled. Not sure if it is really needed, but I put it there anyways.

if (infhp == 1){ // this checks if the int is enabled.
if(IsDead)// checks if you’ve died
IsDead = false;// changes the fact that you’re dead
NewHP = playerLevel[3];//resets your HP to x/x
}

if (command.equals(“infhp”) && playerRights >= 1) { //command(only mods can do it)
if (infhp == 0){ //does this if inf hp is not on.
infhp = 1; //turn infhp on.
sendMessage(“HP Power on”);
}else { // what to do if inf hp is already on
infhp = 0; //turns it off
sendMessage(“HP Power off”);
}
}

Just for the people that want it…

Read full topic
